com.moppy.core.comms.bridge

Class MultiBridge

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.moppy.core.comms.bridge.NetworkBridge<Object>
      • com.moppy.core.comms.bridge.MultiBridge
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    NetworkMessageConsumer, Closeable, AutoCloseable

    public class MultiBridge
extends NetworkBridge<Object>
    A NetworkBridge implementation that supports multiple bridges. This allows, for example, multiple COM ports to be used, or a COM port to be used in conjunction with a network bridge.
